CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select “Net” when an account is 1) “Opted-In” to a Barter agreement/trading deal, 2) the campaign will be channel “Direct”, and 3) the insertion order will be received by GumGum “Net” of discount. Select “Gross” when an account is 1) “Opted-In” to a Barter agreement, 2) the channel can be direct or programmatic, and 3) the campaign revenue will require the discount be paid back to the agency in the form of a rebate or trade credit due.
CustomField.label: Type of Barter Agreement
